sites.compiledCss: pre {font-size: inherit !important;}body {background-size: cover!important; background-attachment: fixed!important; background-position: center center!important;}#breadcrumbs, .header-bar {background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)!important;}div.entry-content {background-color: white!important;}#content-wrapper {width: 100%!important; max-width: 100%!important;}#gradebook_wrapper {width: 100%!important;}#not_right_side {max-width: calc(100% - 24px)!important;}body.gradebook #not_right_side {width: 100%!important; max-width: 100%!important;}#left-side {position: fixed!important; overflow-x: hidden!important; margin-left: 0px!important; padding-top: 20px!important; left: 80px!important; top: 25px!important;}#right-side-wrapper {position: fixed!important; overflow-y: hidden!important; right: 0px!important; top: 0px!important; text-align: right!important; width: 300px!important; height: 56px!important; background-color: rgba(246, 245, 246, 0.8)!important; transition: height 0.5s ease 0s!important; border: 1px solid rgb(199, 205, 209)!important; border-radius: 20px 0px 0px 20px!important;}#right-side-wrapper:hover {height: 100vh!important;}#left-side li.section a, #course_show_secondary a, #course_show_secondary button {border-radius: 5px!important; padding: 4px 20px!important; color: black!important;}#left-side li.section a.active {color: white!important;}#left-side li.section a:hover {color: white!important; background-color: black!important;}#discussion-toolbar .headerBar {left: 180px!important;}#section-tabs-header-subtitle {visibility: hidden!important;}.ic-no-flex-layout #main {margin-top: 35px!important;}#content #full_width_container {top: 6.5em!important;}#left_side_inner {height: calc(100% - 2px) !important;}#full_width_container #right_side {width: 90%!important;}.long_description_link {display: none!important;}.walkme-in-wrapper, .ui-widget-content .gradebook-tooltip {display: none!important;}.ui-widget-overlay {opacity: 0.2!important;}#walkme-player {clip: rect(0px, 0px, 0px, 0px)!important;}.ui-widget-overlay {display: none!important;}div#discussion_subentries {padding: 0px!important; margin-top: 20px!important;}div#discussion_subentries > ul.discussion-entries {margin: 0px!important;}div#discussion_subentries > ul.discussion-entries > li.entry {padding: 15px 0px 0px!important; margin: 15px 0px 0px!important; border-top: 4px dotted rgb(220, 41, 30)!important;}div#discussion_subentries > ul.discussion-entries > li.entry > article.discussion_entry > div.entry-content {background-color: rgb(243, 249, 255)!important;}div#discussion_subentries li.entry {border-width: 0px!important;}div#discussion_subentries article.discussion_entry {border-width: 1px 1px 1px 10px!important; border-style: solid!important; border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204)!important; border-image: initial!important; padding: 0px!important; margin: 0px 0px 1px!important;}div#discussion_subentries article.discussion_entry div.entry-content {padding-left: 20px !important;}div#discussion_subentries ul {margin: 0px 0px 0px 10px!important;}a.discussion-read-state-btn {position: absolute!important; left: 0px!important;}div.discussion-read-state, .read div.discussion-read-state {width: 30px!important; height: 30px!important; top: -17px!important; left: -13px!important; border-radius: 0px 0px 30px!important; border-color: rgb(204, 204, 204)!important;}div.discussions-v2__container-image {display: none!important;}
